body.p: This week's issue of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter notes that the next release of Gentoo Linux 1.4 will be rc3 instead of final. Additional news includes a presentation by one of the Gentoo Linux PPC developers at MIT along with an introduction on how to get up and running with GnuPG. Interested in contributing an article to the GWN? Send an email to gwn-feedback@gentoo.org that summarizes your idea. Topics can be about anything you want, as long as it is somehow related to Gentoo Linux. For selected submissions, we will contact the author and arrange for a full article to be written to appear in a future edition of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter.
